Methods in com.ibm.team.process.common that return IOperationConfigurationInfo
 IOperationConfigurationInfo IBehaviorConfiguration.getOperationConfigurationInfo()

 IOperationConfigurationInfo AdvisableOperation.getOperationConfigurationInfo()
